document.full_text: the man who gave mike tyson his distinctive facial tattoo has sued warner bros. over the similar-looking facial art on ed helms' character in the upcoming comedy "the hangover: part ii."
document.title: mike tyson tattoo artist sues to block "hangover"
lines_and_colors: the man who gave mike tyson his distinctive facial tattoo has sued warner bros. over the similar-looking facial art on ed helms' character in the upcoming comedy "the hangover: part ii."
